title:
What is the status of the Pleasure Island Greenway?  I know they received a $20k grant a few months ago but I haven\'t heard anything more.  At first, there seemed to be a lot of momentum with the project and then it just went quiet.  Their website hasn\'t been updated for over six months.



http://islandgreenway.org/
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.starnewsonline.com/article/20090511/ARTICLES/905119957
